nodes.text: The Council of Seers was a Jedi Council of the Jedi Order in operation prior to the rule of Galactic Emperor and Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Krayt and his Galactic Empire.

The Council of Seers was one of at least two Jedi Councils functioning during the era immediately preceding the Sith–Imperial War, a conflict that would be fought between the Imperial government of Emperor Roan Fel and the Empire of Dark Lord of the Sith Darth Krayt.

The Council members perceived that Jedi Master Kol Skywalker was the one to be assigned on a mission that otherwise might have been assigned to Nat Skywalker. While on the assignment, Skywalker met Imperial Intelligence agent Morrigan Corde who he fell in love with, leading to their betrothal and the conception of a Force-sensitive son, Cade Skywalker.
The Jedi Council of Seers is briefly mentioned in the twenty-fourth issue of the Star Wars: Legacy series, Loyalties, Part 2.
